hp_hero_title: Knowledge that brings order to chaos.
hp_hero_subtitle_1: Boosting your business's digital transformation with data analytics and artificial intelligence solutions.
hp_hero_subtitle_2: At BUNKUA, we transform complex data into clear, actionable insights, driving prosperity and productivity for entrepreneurs through cutting-edge technology.
hp_approach_title:
Our Approach:
Transforming Data into Actionable Intelligence
hp_approach_description-1_1: specializing in turning raw, unstructured data into a powerful asset. We apply rigorous methodologies in data analysis, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to uncover hidden patterns and predict future trends. Our solutions are designed not just to analyze, but to inform, empowering businesses to make smarter, faster decisions.
hp_approach_description_2: We believe that true digital transformation occurs when technology seamlessly integrates with business strategy, creating systems that are intuitive, efficient, and deeply insightful. Our team works closely with clients to build bespoke AI models and implement robust data infrastructures that drive sustainable growth.
hp_expertise_section_title: Our Expertise: Driving Your Digital Future
hp_expertise_section_description: We empower businesses with strategic insights and cutting-edge technology to navigate the complexities of the modern world.
hp_card1_description: Comprehensive analysis of your organization's processes to identify key areas for digital transformation and efficiency gains.
hp_card2_description: Building custom software and technological frameworks tailored to your unique business needs, ensuring scalable and robust solutions.
hp_card3_description: Integrating advanced AI and machine learning models into your existing systems to automate tasks, predict trends, and optimize operations.
hp_card4_description: Leveraging big data and statistical modeling to provide deep insights, enabling data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.
hp_card5_description: Protecting your digital assets with robust cybersecurity strategies, ensuring data integrity and business continuity.
hp_card6_description: Driving future growth by exploring emerging technologies and developing innovative solutions for competitive advantage.
hp_clients_section_description: Hear directly from the businesses we've empowered.
hp_client_quote_1: Working with Hascunde was transformative. They helped us expand our experience and find a unique approach that aligned with our company's vision.
hp_client_title_1: General Manager - Peru at Bray LATAM
hp_client_quote_2: Collaborating with Hascunde became a path of self-discovery, helping us refine an authentic, effective, and purposeful management style based on our strengths and weaknesses.
hp_client_title_2: Freelance Consulting - Business Strategy - B2B Sales - International Business Development
hp_client_quote_3: Hascunde helped us reflect on our business model, identifying strengths and weaknesses we hadn't seen before. This allowed us to restructure processes and optimize our strategy, opening up new possibilities.
hp_client_title_3: Manager of Goby Industries SAS - Goby Filters
hp_client_quote_4: BUNKUA’s technology solutions seamlessly integrated with our existing infrastructure, proving their expertise and adaptability.
hp_client_quote_5: Exceptional service and deep understanding of AI. BUNKUA is truly a leader in bringing order to complex data environments.
hp_client_title_5: Head of Data Science, Quantum Analytics
hp_client_quote_6: Our growth accelerated dramatically after implementing BUNKUA's strategic recommendations. A true partner in innovation.
hp_transform_section_description: Connect with BUNKUA today to discover how our data analysis and AI services can unlock new potentials for your company.
sv_portadaTitulo: Empowering Your Business Through Digital Innovation
sv_portadaSubtitulo: Transforming Challenges into Opportunities with Data & AI
sv_portadaDescripcion: At BUNKUA, we partner with visionary entrepreneurs to navigate the complexities of the digital age, providing precise data analysis and intelligent AI solutions that bring order to chaos and unlock unparalleled productivity.
sv_serviciosDescripcion: BUNKUA's specialized services are designed to address your most critical business needs, from identifying deep-rooted issues to implementing state-of-the-art AI.
sv_diagInstDescripcion: Uncover organizational challenges and opportunities through comprehensive data-driven assessments.
sv_solTecDescripcion: Craft bespoke technology solutions tailored to your unique business needs and future growth.
sv_iaImplDescripcion: Integrate cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence tools to automate, predict, and innovate your operations.
sv_procesoDescripcion: We follow a rigorous, client-centric methodology to ensure every solution is effective, sustainable, and perfectly aligned with your strategic goals.
sv_procesoPaso1Descripcion: In-depth understanding of your current state, challenges, and objectives.
sv_procesoPaso2Descripcion: Developing a tailored roadmap for digital transformation and AI integration.
sv_procesoPaso3Descripcion: Building and deploying robust solutions with continuous collaboration.
sv_procesoPaso4Descripcion: Ensuring long-term success with ongoing performance tuning and dedicated support.
sv_porQueDescripcion: Partner with us to gain a competitive edge. Our commitment to excellence, deep expertise, and client-first approach sets us apart.
sv_impactoProbadoDescripcion: Track record of delivering tangible business outcomes and significant ROI for our clients.
sv_equipoExpertoDescripcion: Highly skilled professionals with deep expertise in data science, AI, and software engineering.
sv_seguroEscalableDescripcion: Solutions built with enterprise-grade security and designed for future growth.
sv_solucionesMedidaDescripcion: Customized approaches that fit your unique challenges, not one-size-fits-all templates.
sv_listoTransformarDescripcion: Let's discuss how BUNKUA's expertise in data analysis and AI can drive your next wave of growth and efficiency.
au_aboutUsDescripcion: Driving massive transformation through intelligent technology and unwavering commitment to client success.
au_nuestraHistoriaTitulo: Our Story: From Vision to Impact
au_nuestraHistoriaDescripcion1: is the technological services unit of
au_nuestraHistoriaDescripcion2: founded on the principle that knowledge brings order to chaos. Our vision is to empower entrepreneurs through the intelligent use of data in artificial intelligence. Our journey began with a small team and a big idea: to transform businesses by making complex data simple and actionable. Over time, we've grown, learned, and refined our approach, always true to our commitment to innovation and our clients' business success. We believe in creating tangible value that leads to prosperity and a lasting impact for our clients and partners.
au_misionTitulo: Our mission is to facilitate unprecedented prosperity, abundance, tranquility, and productivity for entrepreneurs by enabling intelligent technology adoption.
au_valorInnovacionDescripcion: Continuously seeking cutting-edge solutions to deliver unparalleled value.
au_valorExcelenciaDescripcion: Committed to delivering the highest quality in every aspect of our work.
au_valorIntegridadDescripcion: Operating with transparency, honesty, and a strong ethical compass.
au_valorCentricidadClienteDescripcion: Prioritizing our clients needs to forge lasting partnerships and mutual success.
au_valorEficienciaDescripcion: Streamlining processes and optimizing workflows for maximum productivity.
au_valorImpactoDescripcion: Dedicated to creating measurable and positive transformation for businesses.
au_hito2020Descripcion: BUNKUA founded with a mission to bring order to chaos through data analytics.
au_hito2021Descripcion: Launched first institutional diagnosis framework, aiding businesses in strategic planning.
au_hito2022Descripcion: Expanded service offerings to include custom AI tool development and integration.
au_hito2023Descripcion: Achieved significant client growth, serving over 50 enterprise customers globally.
au_hito2024Descripcion: Introduced proprietary AI-driven predictive analytics platform, enhancing client foresight.
au_nuevoRetoDescripcion: Discover opportunities to shape the future of digital transformation with BUNKUA. We're always looking for talented individuals to join our growing team and contribute to meaningful impact.
cs_portadaDescripcion: Explore how BUNKUA drives innovation and success for businesses worldwide through data-driven strategies and AI.
cs_card1Descripcion: We developed a CRM/ERP system tailored to the needs of small and medium-sized businesses, capable of automating administrative processes aimed at maximizing sales and optimizing commercial management for up to 50% greater profitability.
cs_card2Descripcion: We implemented a mobile solution for field asset tracking, integrating Local First (local storage in the absence of an internet connection) and voice-to-text features to facilitate the collection of asset information in hard-to-reach areas or with special conditions.
cs_card3Descripcion: Responsive Web Development and Integration with Artificial Intelligence Agents.
cs_card3Metrica: 25% more effective in communicating with potential customers
cs_card4Descripcion: We develop artificial intelligence agents and AI-based automations to streamline those repetitive processes that are part of your day-to-day business, so you can make smart use of your time.
cs_card5Titulo: Consulting in digital transformation, data science, and AI
cs_card5Descripcion: We seek to provide you with a solid foundation in artificial intelligence trends. Our goal is for you to identify the challenges that Latin American companies face when implementing AI and, through successful examples and automation tools, design your own adoption strategies.
cs_card6Descripcion: Introduced a mobile-first data collection and reporting system for a field service company, increasing daily task completion rates by 35% and reducing administrative overhead.
cs_card7Descripcion: Implemented an AI-driven recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform, leading to a 10% increase in average order value and improved customer retention.
cs_card8Descripcion: Developed a robust data governance framework for a healthcare client, ensuring full regulatory compliance and providing a single source of truth for critical patient data.
cs_card9Descripcion: Designed and deployed a scalable cloud infrastructure for a rapidly growing FinTech startup, enabling them to handle 5x user traffic while maintaining peak performance.
cs_readyTransformDescripcion: Contact BUNKUA today to discuss your unique challenges and discover how our data analysis and AI services can drive your success.

Lp-cap-title-portada: AI for Business Transformation in Latin America
Lp-cap-description-portada: Open the doors to the business future of Latin America with our course. Learn to lead digital transformation, overcoming local challenges and implementing AI for sustainable and successful growth.
Lp-cap-description-justificacion: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has ceased to be a futuristic promise to become a transformative tool that redefines business models and global competitiveness. For Latin American companies, understanding and adopting these trends is crucial to overcoming the challenges inherent to the region (infrastructure, digital divide, specialized talent) and capitalizing on the opportunities that AI offers in terms of efficiency, innovation, and growth. This proposal seeks to provide participants with the theoretical knowledge and practical tools necessary to design and implement successful AI strategies, drawing inspiration from regional and global success stories, and addressing the specific challenges of the Latin American context.
Lp-cap-card-1-description: Executives, area managers, team leaders, technical staff, and decision-makers from Latin American companies interested in the implementation and leveraging of Artificial Intelligence.
Lp-cap-card-2-description: Hybrid Modality: Live virtual classes with specialized practical workshops for a complete experience.
Lp-cap-card-3-description: 12 total hours (6 modules of 2 hours each).
Lp-cap-module-1-title: Module 1 : Contextualization of Artificial Intelligence Technological Trends (2 hours)
Lp-cap-module-1-item-2: Main Branches of AI: Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision (CV), Robotics and AI (brief introduction).
Lp-cap-module-1-item-3: Emerging Trends: Generative AI (ChatGPT, Midjourney), Explainable AI (XAI), Edge AI, AI for Sustainability.
Lp-cap-module-2-title: Module 2 : Institutional Challenges for Latin American Companies in AI Adoption (2 hours)
Lp-cap-module-2-item-7: Access to Funding and Venture Capital for AI Innovation.
Lp-cap-module-3-title: Module 3 : Success Stories of AI Adoption and Implementation in Latin America (2 hours)
Lp-cap-module-3-item-1: Sectoral Cases: Finance, Retail and Mass Consumption, Health, Agriculture, Manufacturing.
Lp-cap-module-4-title: Module 4 : Automations with AI: Fundamentals and Strategies (2 hours)
Lp-cap-module-4-item-2: Identification of Candidate Processes for AI Automation.
Lp-cap-module-5-title: Module 5 : Tools and Platforms for AI and Automation Implementation (4 hours)
Lp-cap-module-5-item-3: No-Code/Low-Code Platforms for AI and Automation.
Lp-cap-module-6-title: Module 6 : Development of an AI/Automation Project Proposal for Your Company (2 hours)
Lp-cap-module-6-item-3: Identification of Necessary Data and Sources.
Lp-cap-module-6-item-5: Definition of Success Metrics and KPIs.
Lp-cap-module-6-item-8: Presentation and Discussion of Individual/Group Proposals.
Lp-cap-title-recursos-necesitas: Everything You Need for Your Success
Lp-cap-recursos-item-1-description: Zoom, Google Meet, or similar for virtual sessions.
Lp-cap-recursos-item-2-description: Mural, Miro, or similar for workshops.
Lp-cap-recursos-item-3-description: Trial accounts, free versions, or lab environments.
Lp-cap-resultados-description: Upon completing the program, participants will be prepared to:
Lp-cap-resultados-item-1-description: With confidence and knowledge, from ideation to delivery.
Lp-cap-resultados-item-3-description: Manage stakeholder expectations and keep teams aligned.
Lp-cap-resultados-item-4-description: Have a solid foundation for exams like PMP or Scrum Master.
Lp-cap-footer-description: Enroll today in our Advanced Project Management Program and become the leader your projects need.
LpAppBrey-title: APP BREY: The Ultimate Solution for Field Asset Management
LpAppBrey-subtitle: Optimize the collection and management of your field assets with our robust and easy-to-use mobile application. Work offline, capture data with voice, and ensure the integrity of your information.
LpAppBrey-card-text-1: Protected access with multiple security layers to guarantee the privacy and confidentiality of your data.
LpAppBrey-card-text-2: Capture crucial data even without an internet connection. Automatic synchronization upon restoring connectivity.
LpAppBrey-card-text-3: Streamline information capture with voice-to-text conversion, reducing errors and registration times.
LpAppBrey-card-text-4: Manage and adapt user profiles according to the specific needs of each role within your organization.
LpAppBrey-admin-list-item-1: Complete management of users and roles.
LpAppBrey-footer-title: Ready to Optimize Your Company's Asset Management?
Lp-crm-title: Enterprise CRM and MRP: Drive Your Growth
Lp-crm-subtitle: Centralize your customer relationships, automate sales, and optimize every interaction to boost your productivity and profitability.
Lp-crm-section-1-title: What is a CRM and why do you need it?
Lp-crm-section-1-text: A Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system is the tool that allows you to organize, analyze, and improve every interaction with your customers and potential clients. In short, it's your ally for building solid business relationships and, in turn, driving your sales.
Lp-crm-section-2-subtitle: Our CRM integrates essential modules for complete and efficient business management.
Lp-crm-section-2-lead-text: Manage the lifecycle of your prospects from the first contact to conversion. The CRM allows you to capture leads, nurture them, and convert them into opportunities, following a clear sales flow:
Lp-crm-section-3-stage-3-text: Negotiate and close deals with follow-up.
Lp-crm-section-3-stage-4-text: Record the sale and manage post-closure.
Lp-crm-section-4-subtitle: Manage every stage of the sales cycle, from creating offers to customer acceptance.
Lp-crm-section-4-card-1-text: Generate detailed proposals with products and prices.
Lp-crm-section-4-card-3-text: Create and follow up on contracts with your clients.
Lp-crm-section-4-card-4-text: Send personalized emails at each sales stage, saving time and effort.
Lp-crm-section-4-card-5-text: Allow your customers to accept proposals and contracts directly from the web.
Lp-crm-section-4-card-6-text: Get detailed reports to identify trends and optimize commercial strategies.
Lp-crm-section-5-subtitle: Automate invoicing and payment tracking for effortless financial management.
Lp-crm-section-5-card-1-text: Create professional invoices quickly, automatically integrating sales data.
Lp-crm-section-5-card-2-text: Monitor the status of your payments, with automatic reminders for outstanding debts.
Lp-crm-section-5-card-3-text: Record and classify all your operating expenses for accurate financial management.
Lp-crm-section-6-subtitle: The heart of your CRM, where all customer and prospect information resides securely and accessibly.
Lp-crm-section-6-text-1: The contacts module is the source of truth for all your customer data.
Lp-crm-section-6-text-2-text: Stores customer profiles, interaction history, notes, and documents.
Lp-crm-section-6-text-3-text: It is used by other modules (Sales, Marketing, Support) to automatically fill in data and ensure consistency.
Lp-crm-section-6-text-4-text: Offers a complete view of each customer, allowing for personalized and efficient service.
Lp-crm-section-6-benefits-list-1: Quick access to complete information for each customer.
Lp-crm-section-6-benefits-list-2: Unified interaction history for consistent communication.
Lp-crm-section-6-benefits-list-3: Advanced segmentation for targeted marketing campaigns.
Lp-crm-section-6-benefits-list-4: Improves collaboration between sales and support teams.
Lp-crm-section-7-subtitle: Manage your inventory efficiently with real-time control and full integration.
Lp-crm-section-7-card-1-text: Monitor your inventory levels, inflows, and outflows, preventing shortages or excesses.
Lp-crm-section-7-card-2-text: Automatically connect your sales with inventory and plan production based on real demand.
Lp-crm-footer-subtitle: Discover how Enterprise CRM can centralize your operations, boost your sales, and scale your growth.
